title: Finders Keepers
description: Multi-billionaire Alex Drake will put everything on the line for just one woman.She's all that matters. All he wants.But their love was built on the ashes of the past; it's a history they can't escape.He'll travel across the globe,take on his greatest enemy,Dig up every skeleton, andUncover a dangerous secret.Find the reason for it all â€¦ and hope to keep what's his. Madison Taylor.Warning: Full Steam Ahead. Lexxi James Books are seductive, suspenseful romances filled with fun, sensual, and sizzling high-heat love scenes.Highly recommend reading books in order.
author: Lexxi James
